entry.value: Train a basic logistic regression model.

from sklearn.linear_model import LogisticRegression%%00010# Choose class labels column%%00010lables = input_table['Cluster Membership']%%00010%%00010# Designate features to learn from%%00010features = input_table.iloc[:,0:10]%%00010%%00010# Create a logistic regression classifier%%00010output_model = LogisticRegression()%%00010%%00010# Fit the model using the features and labels%%00010output_model.fit(features, lables)%%00010
